replies.body:
1 figure peeks above a white snowy hill, on his shoulder are 4 white fluffy poros.

{{summoner:31}} {{item:3680}}  Bre! _pant pant_ Bre!
{{champion:201}}  Eh? Want to rest...
{{summoner:31}} {{item:3680}} _tiredly_ Bree
{{champion:201}} Well... Okay then, we will stop for the night.
{{summoner:31}}  Bre! BRE! BBRREEEEE!,,,

_1 hour later_

A small campfire is lit, 3 poros gather around it. The fourth asleep on Braum's shoulder
{{summoner:31}}  _looks expectingly at Braum_
 {{champion:201}} _smiles_ Want story eh?
{{summoner:31}} _they light up with joy!_ Bre!
{{champion:201}}  Well then, when we last left off, Elise was surrounded.... or was she...
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

In a giant castle, Elise sits on a throne, holding a magic blue plant

{{champion:60}} _looks into scrying bloom_ Show me what you see.
{{item:3363}} _Elise sees "herself surronded by all the citizens of the Shadow Isles_
{{item:3363}} {{champion:30}} _How long can she stay up there_
{{item:3363}} {{champion:429}}  _I hope she is quick, there are others I must take my vengeance on_

_the scrying bloom pops, and the vision ends,_

{{champion:60}} Oh my... I guess it's a good thing I decided not to go..
{{champion:60}} _carefully replants the bulb_
{{item:3814}}  They did not take kindly
{{champion:35}} _appears out of nowhere_
{{champion:60}} _jumps 3 feet into the air, transforming into a spider_ AHHHHH!
{{champion:35}} Sorry my queen, I forgot you scare easily
{{champion:60}} _Back in human form_ WILDCARD, you mustn't scare me like that!
{{champion:35}} _A wild smile on his face_ Sorry your Excellency
{{champion:60}} Ugg nevermind. You were saying?
{{champion:35}} It seems the Monsters of the Shadow Isles do not take kindly to your claim.
{{champion:60}} This is more difficult then expected... I must change plans, if I can't count on the Shadow Isles for support, I must gain the favor of the court... WILDCARD?
{{champion:35}} Yes, Your Highness?
{{champion:60}} BRING ME THE PRISONERS
{{champion:35}}  Of course, Magesty _disappears in a puff of dust_
{{champion:60}} _shudders_ I hate that!
{{champion:35}}  Hate what?
{{champion:60}} GAHH!! _looks around but sees nothing, although she hears a faint laugh_

10 minutes later

Jack of Hearts Twisted Fate, Ace of Spades Ezreal, and Queen of Diamonds Syndra get shoved into the room

{{champion:35}} Here they are, My Queen
{{champion:60}} Thank you Wildcard...
{{champion:60}} _Turns attention to the 3 figures, each shackled to the floor_ Hello, I am your Rul-
{{champion:81}}  No, no your not, Mordekaiser is our king and ruler
{{champion:60}} _glares at Ezreal_ Shut Up _traps him in a cocoon_
{{champion:60}} NOW, as I was saying, I am your new leader, everyone bow and swear loyalty to me

Nobody moved, Syndra looked downwards, Twisted Fate looked bored

{{champion:60}} I'M WAITING!!!!
{{champion:134}} _looks up, tears in eyes_ no
{{champion:60}} _shocked _ What?
{{champion:134}}  no
{{champion:60}}  _looks at Ezreal, (now decocooned)_ What of you?
{{champion:81}} _begins kneeling_ Why of course, My Que- _suddenly he stands up looking at Syndra_ NOW

Waiting.... Waiting..... Waiting....

{{champion:60}}  Hahaha ha Fools...
{{champion:81}} {{champion:134}}  My Powers...
{{champion:60}}_practically screeching with joy_  I blocked them, your pow- _glances at Twisted Fate who has his cuffs off_
{{champion:60}}  How did you....
{{champion:4}}  A magician never reve-
{{champion:60}} _panicked_ No! Don't you dare say a magician never reveals his secret.
{{champion:4}} _mouth hangs open, slowly he shuts it. Turning in a circle of cards he disappears but not without saying_ 
{{champion:4}} ABRACADABRA

Waiting.... Waiting... Waiting...

{{champion:60}} Well... that certainly changes things

{{champion:81}}  He made it
{{champion:134}}  He did it
_they smiled at each other_

{{champion:60}} _scowling_ WELL, I am hungry and in a bad mood, So I guess I will eat you...
_turns inot a spider, and quickly eat Syndra and Ezreal_

{{champion:60}}  _burps_ Yum.. That was De- WAIT!!!! THAT'S IT!!!!! I'll SUMMON VILEMAW!!!!! Ahahahahahahahahah!
_thoughtful for a second_ I guess... A full stomach does help you think...

Somewhere In Demacia

{{champion:4}}  Appears on a street, quickly he walks into the nearest bar
{{champion:4}} Everyone, we MUST help the Shadow Isles, Mordekaiser is missing and Elise is-
{{item:3211}}  Is that Twisted Fate?
{{item:3211}} It is!
{{item:3211}} He owes me money
{{item:3211}} CHEATER! FRAUD!
{{item:3211}}  LET'S GET HIM
{{champion:4}} This is unfortunate..._with that he vanished in a cloud of cards_

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

{{champion:201}} _Pauses and looks at Poros, 3 are looking at him. Hanging on his everyword... The other, still asleep_

Noone said a word for awhile until finally

{{summoner:31}} {{item:3680}}  Breezzzzzz Breezzzzzz

{{champion:201}} _chuckling softly_ Well, time to go to bed, We finish story tommorow!
{{summoner:31}} _pleading eyes_ Breeeeee
{{champion:201}} No. You need sleep, We almost to Palace, and you must be best poro for Queen.
{{summoner:31}}  _shuffles to bed_

Once they all left, Braum gently placed Freezy in his palm.

{{champion:201}}  _whispering_ I'll get you back to him, before Snowdown, I promise

Popstar Ahri chroma early sale ends 7-31, Popstar Ahri skin sale begins 8-1. That is sad timing... you cant buy the chroma until you own the skin, so you are paying full price for one of them if you want them both and dont have the skin yet
There's an about 12 hours window after a new sale starts during which the previous sale is still active. You can use it to buy the skin and then the chromas.
Do you know the exact time?
Is Popstar Ahri still on sale? It's August 3rd, 11 pm and it's showing up as full price in the store for me. Did the sale end already?
I've already gotten Firefox and Arcade Ahri from boxes, but Popstar's recall dance is pretty neat too...
At least they aren't bad skins.
